sentences.english: State-owned enterprises are the pillar of the national economy.

sentences.english: This article is introduced a new, slotted connection structure of support - pole for spherical tanks.

sentences.english: Front suspension is by MacPherson struts, with coil springs and an anti-roll bar.

sentences.english: Manufacturing industry of the heavy equipments is major pillar of the national economy.

sentences.english: Elsewhere, they may be tethered at stanchions .

sentences.english: Wealth creates what has historically been the social backbone of democracy: a middle class.

sentences.english: Hand rails and banisters shall be constructed for stainless steel pipe.

sentences.english: In fact, it is the mainstay of many Agile development methods.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，這是許多敏捷開發方法的支柱。

sentences.english: A dynamic model of landing gear struts is introduced in a non-inertial coordinate system.

sentences.english: My parent are the stanchion of our family.
It turned out that this line was the "backbone" around which the three-dimensional model of the universe is formed.
sentences.chinese: 結果這條線成了形成三維宇宙模型的主要支柱。

sentences.english: Chongqing medical industry becomes one of the top 5 pillar industries in Chongqing district.

sentences.english: I consider these to be the three pillars of creativity.
